// SURVEILLANCE FEED

Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

View the Project on GitHub

cvg/nice-slam

dense SLAM with neural implicit encoding for indoor scenes

View on index

Related repos

  • Visual SLAM using a 3D prior for dynamic environments
  • monocular SLAM for huge outdoor scenes using hierarchical Gaussian splats
  • Real-time dense SLAM from a single camera using 3D reconstruction priors, with global pose and geometry estimation at 15 FPS
  • RGB SLAM baseline using monocular depth and Gaussian scene mapping, easy to try out for 3D reconstruction from video
  • visual slam experiments toolkit with easy dataset handling and benchmarking
  • VGGT is a neural network that predicts 3D scene attributes like camera parameters, depth, and point maps from images
  • Shows how to use OpenCV and COLMAP for simple structure from motion and 3D scene reconstruction
  • procedural 3D scene generator for computer vision and AI training
  • ElasticFusion lets you build real-time 3D maps of indoor spaces using an RGB-D camera, perfect for capturing detailed room layouts as you move around
  • Maps Home Assistant entities to SVG floorplans
